formatDescription: The DirectDraw Surface file format was introduced with DirectX 7 to store uncompressed and compressed textures. The file format supports mipmaps, cube maps, and volume maps.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

internalSignatures.name: DirectDraw Surface
internalSignatures.note:
BOF: magic: 'DDS ', length of header (0x7C000000) = 124 bytes
